content: For some reason for the past couple weeks every time I load up zulip it will start at June 19, regardless of where I left off. If I scroll down, at a certain point it suddenly marks all my messages as read despite not having reached the bottom. This is really frustrating me!
@Peter Rabbit Is it convenient for you to file a bug? Mention that you're coming from the Rust community.
Mine does the same. The "All Messages" view starts at May 29th every time I open Zulip. I never actually use "All Messages", so it doesn't bother me, but I always thought it was strange.
Hey! I thought it was only me or my client! Same here!

If you're experiencing similar issues, I opened an issue here: https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/15770

Please feel free to comment on that issue with details of how it affects you as well.
